rendered:
銗銗銗
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

銗字的基本解释

銗
hóu
〔鏂銗〕见“
鏂”。

銗
xiàng
古同“缿”，古代一种接受告密文书或储蓄钱币用的器具，腹大口窄，东西放进去不易从入口处取出：“投銗购告言奸。”

銗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóu］
［《廣韻》户鉤切，平侯，匣。］
见“銗鏤”。
[②]［xiàng］
同“缿1”。
古代接纳告密文书的器具。

銗字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銗； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1305第06
【集韻】胡溝切，音侯。頸鉗也。【博雅】錏鍜謂之鏂銗。　又【前漢·義縱傳】投銗購告言姦。【註】銗，所以受投書也。

銗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
銗字的起名意思

暂无。

銗
Basic explanation of words
銗
hóu
〔鏂銗〕See "
鏂".
銗
xiàng
Ancient Tong "缿", an ancient instrument for receiving informant documents or savings coins, had a large belly and a narrow mouth, and it was not easy to take things out of the entrance when they were put in: "Purchasing an informant."
銗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóu］
["Guangyun" household hook-cut, Pinghou, box. ]
See "Luo".
[②]［xiàng］
Same as "缿1".
An ancient instrument for receiving informant documents.
銗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銗; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1305 06
[Jiyun] Hugou cut, sound Hou. Neck clamp also. 【Liberal Arts】Chan-chai is called “chai-chai”.　[Previous Han·Yi Zong Biography] Voted to buy and confessed traitors. [Note] Huan, so it is also accepted by the book.
銗

xiàng
сущ. * кружка (для сбора прошений, денег)
